title: When a Sharpened Pencil Just Isn’t Enough
description: Nonprofit groups bolster educational pursuits by helping young people get the little things — a printer, a book that inspires — that make a big difference.
dc:creator: Callie Holtermann
category: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
media:credit: Sasha Maslov for The New York Times
media:description: Fatoumata Drame didn’t have a printer when she began attending classes in person at Lehman College in the Bronx.
